plugins.name: Validator
plugins.description: Validator is a tool to verify that all elements in your design correctly use defined design tokens. It helps maintain visual consistency by quickly identifying non-compliant elements, invalid properties, and suggesting corrections to ensure adherence to your design system. Supports validation of colors, spacing, typography, and components with Figma variables.
plugins.tagline: Validate design tokens and ensure design system consistency

plugins.name: Export Icon to Compose
plugins.description: Export Icon to Compose is a Figma plugin that lets you export selected vector objects as SVG and instantly convert them into clean, production-ready Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs. It automatically extracts the object's name, dimensions, and processes all <path> elements using the integrated svg-path-parser library. This streamlined workflow saves time, reduces manual coding errors, and improves your design-to-code process.
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma icons as SVG and generate clean, ready-to-use Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs

130138.name: Export Icon to Compose
130138.description: Export Icon to Compose is a Figma plugin that lets you export selected vector objects as SVG and instantly convert them into clean, production-ready Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs. It automatically extracts the object's name, dimensions, and processes all <path> elements using the integrated svg-path-parser library. This streamlined workflow saves time, reduces manual coding errors, and improves your design-to-code process.
130138.tagline: Export your Figma icons as SVG and generate clean, ready-to-use Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs

plugins.name: SafeToSell - Trademark checker
plugins.description:
SafeToSell helps digital product creators, print-on-demand sellers, and e-commerce designers automatically scan their designs for active trademarks and forbidden keywords.


Simply select text elements from your Figma frame, and the plugin will instantly validate if theyre safe to sell on popular platforms like Etsy, Shopify, Printify, and more.


---


Instant trademark scan

Detect banned phrases before you publish

Avoid copyright strikes, takedowns, or store bans

Built for POD, digital goods, and e-commerce sellers


---


Whether you're designing T-shirts, wall art, digital downloads, or listing mockups, SafeToSell gives you peace of mind that your text wont get flagged or removed.


Dont risk losing your store scan it before you sell it.
plugins.tagline: Instantly check your designs for trademarks and banned phrases before uploading.

132165.name: SafeToSell - Trademark checker
132165.description:
SafeToSell helps digital product creators, print-on-demand sellers, and e-commerce designers automatically scan their designs for active trademarks and forbidden keywords.


Simply select text elements from your Figma frame, and the plugin will instantly validate if theyre safe to sell on popular platforms like Etsy, Shopify, Printify, and more.


---

---

Dont risk losing your store scan it before you sell it.
132165.tagline: Instantly check your designs for trademarks and banned phrases before uploading.

plugins.name: Layer Name Selector
plugins.description:
Finding the right layers in your design just got easier!


Layer Name Selector lets you define a scope (either the entire page or the selected area), choose specific layer types, and automatically select all matching layers with a single click.


Features:

1 Define scope: Work on the current page or only within selected elements.

2 Filter by layer type: Choose from Text, Instance, Component, Frame, Group and Rectangle.

3 One-click selection: Hit the "Select" button and let the plugin do the work!


Perfect for organizing large files, speeding up your workflow, and making precise edits in seconds. Try it out now!


Buy me a coffee
plugins.tagline: Quickly select layers by type and scope. Find what you need in seconds, effortlessly.

128032.name: Layer Name Selector
128032.description:
Finding the right layers in your design just got easier!


Layer Name Selector lets you define a scope (either the entire page or the selected area), choose specific layer types, and automatically select all matching layers with a single click.


Features:

1 Define scope: Work on the current page or only within selected elements.

2 Filter by layer type: Choose from Text, Instance, Component, Frame, Group and Rectangle.

3 One-click selection: Hit the "Select" button and let the plugin do the work!


Perfect for organizing large files, speeding up your workflow, and making precise edits in seconds. Try it out now!

128032.tagline: Quickly select layers by type and scope. Find what you need in seconds, effortlessly.

plugins.name: Postcard Generator Experiment
plugins.description:
This plugin is a study project for the Generative AI course at the Innopolis University.


It tries it's best to generate greeting cards by combining layout generation, user-uploaded photos, a custom AI-generated poem and a thematic AI-generated background.


To run, get a token at an https://openrouter.ai and place it as the only text block on an empty page.


For help feel free to write me at levada.andrew@gmail.com


Github https://github.com/andrewlevada/postcard-generator-experiment
plugins.tagline: A study project: a couple of llm's trying their best to design

plugins.name: Little Bro
plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a toolit's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.
plugins.tagline: A companion to help you design better, faster, and smarter

Little Bro is more than just a toolit's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.

plugins.name: Guru Guides
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that delivers UX guidelines and customisable content, seamlessly integrating design system guides into Figma workflows.


Read the article


Guideline customisation

Connect Contentful to Guru Guides to customise guidelines for your organisation, tailoring them to specific projects, components, or patterns.


Watch the walkthrough


Default guidelines

Guru Guides offers default guidelines to help novice designers master modern web design by adopting essential components and best practices.


Benefits

Explore how consistent design principles enhance user experience, ensure brand alignment, and streamline team collaboration.
plugins.tagline: Customisable UX guidelines for Figma. Connect Contentful or use defaults to streamline design.

plugins.name: Applink
plugins.description: Applink is a simple yet effective plugin that enhances collaboration in Figma by allowing users to copy and share local URLs instead of the standard Figma.com links. This ensures seamless navigation directly from the Figma app to the app, eliminating the detour through a browser. Perfect for teams, Applink streamlines the sharing process by saving time and simplifying workflows.
plugins.tagline: Effortless link sharing, straight from app to app

plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
113549.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

plugins.name: OxyReIcon
plugins.description:
OxyReIcon is the ultimate Figma plugin for designers and icon creators who want to streamline their workflow and create consistent, professional-looking icon sets effortlessly.


Key Features:

  1. Instantly create frames around your vector icons
  2. Customize background and icon colors with opacity control
  3. Automatically align icons in a customizable grid layout
  4. Resize icons and frames with precise control
  5. Convert framed icons back to vectors with a single click
  6. Save and load your preferred settings for quick access


Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. Say goodbye to manual resizing and positioning let our plugin do the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters most: designing great icons.
plugins.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

103926.name: OxyReIcon
103926.description:
OxyReIcon is the ultimate Figma plugin for designers and icon creators who want to streamline their workflow and create consistent, professional-looking icon sets effortlessly.


Key Features:

  1. Instantly create frames around your vector icons
  2. Customize background and icon colors with opacity control
  3. Automatically align icons in a customizable grid layout
  4. Resize icons and frames with precise control
  5. Convert framed icons back to vectors with a single click
  6. Save and load your preferred settings for quick access


Whether you're creating a comprehensive icon library, designing a cohesive UI, or preparing assets for development handoff, OxyReIcon has got you covered. Say goodbye to manual resizing and positioning let our plugin do the heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters most: designing great icons.
103926.tagline: Transform your vector icons into perfectly styled, grid-aligned frames in seconds.

plugins.name: Multiclip
plugins.description:
What's New in v1.0

Copy multiple text elements anywhere in Figma.

Select entire sections or frames to copy all text elements at once.

Saved items remain available even after closing the plugin.

Copy previous text to clipboard when replacing.

Quickly paste saved text into selected text layers or create a new text node if none is selected.

Easily remove all stored items when needed.

A clean and simple interface for managing copied text efficiently.


How It Works

Select text layers and click "Copy" to add them to your clipboard.

Manage clipboard history (up to 10 items).

Click "Paste" to insert saved text into selected text layers.


Upcoming Features

Copy, save, and images or illustrations to clipboard.

Categorize copied items.

Custom paste settings.
plugins.tagline: Copy multiple texts to clipboard seamlessly

plugins.name: Figma Recall
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you save, manage, and switch between different versions (iterations) of your Figma frames.


Save an Iteration: Select a frame and click the Save button to save its current state.


Save with a Note: Hold Ctrl/Cmd and click the Save button to add a text description to your saved iteration.


Recall All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Recall button to view all its saved versions side-by-side.


Update Iterations: Make changes in the recalled container frame for any version and click Save to update with your changes in the stored master versions.


Navigate Versions: Use the < and > arrow buttons to cycle through saved iterations directly on your canvas.


Delete All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Delete button (trash icon) to remove all its saved versions.


Rename Iterations: Right-click the Save button to rename the selected frame and its entire group of saved iterations.
plugins.tagline: Version History but for Each Frame

138354.name: Figma Recall
138354.description:
This plugin lets you save, manage, and switch between different versions (iterations) of your Figma frames.


Save an Iteration: Select a frame and click the Save button to save its current state.


Save with a Note: Hold Ctrl/Cmd and click the Save button to add a text description to your saved iteration.


Recall All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Recall button to view all its saved versions side-by-side.


Update Iterations: Make changes in the recalled container frame for any version and click Save to update with your changes in the stored master versions.


Navigate Versions: Use the < and > arrow buttons to cycle through saved iterations directly on your canvas.


Delete All Iterations: Select a frame and click the Delete button (trash icon) to remove all its saved versions.


Rename Iterations: Right-click the Save button to rename the selected frame and its entire group of saved iterations.
138354.tagline: Version History but for Each Frame

plugins.name: Design-to-JSON
plugins.description:
Design to JSON: A Developer's Bridge


Supercharge your design-to-development workflow with Design to JSON. This plugin inspects your selected Figma layers and recursively exports the entire hierarchy into a clean, structured, and developer-friendly JSON format. Stop manually transcribing design specs and start automating your UI development.


Who Is It For?

This plugin is built primarily for Frontend Developers and UI Engineers who need to translate Figma designs into pixel-perfect code. It's also a powerful tool for Design System Maintainers and anyone looking to automate asset extraction or design analysis.


Key Features:

Recursive Tree Traversal: It doesn't just scan the top layer. The plugin dives deep into all nested frames, groups, and components to give you a complete hierarchical view.

Absolute Coordinates for Layout: Outputs the global coordinates and dimensions (absoluteRenderBounds) for every element, which is exactly what you need for CSS positioning, eliminating guesswork with relative positions.

Comprehensive Property Extraction: Captures a wide range of properties crucial for development:

oGeometry: Position, size, rotation.

oStyling: Fills, strokes, and effects with RGBA color values (0-255).

oTypography: Font family, style, size, line height, letter spacing, and alignment.

oAuto Layout: Direction, padding, and item spacing.

oComponent Info: Details about instances and their main components.

Simple & Clean UI: A straightforward interface to generate and copy the JSON with a single click.


How to Use:

1.Select one or more elements on your Figma canvas.

2.Run the "Design to JSON" plugin.

3.Click the "Generate JSON" button.

4.The JSON output will appear in the text area.

5.Click "Copy to Clipboard" to grab the data and use it in your code.


Best Practices for Your Design File:

To get the most accurate and useful JSON, it's recommended to follow these design practices:

Name Your Layers: Use descriptive layer names (e.g., "SubmitButton" instead of "Rectangle 128"). These names appear directly in the JSON, making it much more readable.

Embrace Auto Layout: The plugin is built to understand Auto Layout. Using it for components, buttons, and layouts will provide rich data (padding, spacing, direction) that is directly translatable to Flexbox or similar CSS models.

Use Components: Structuring your design with components helps maintain a clean hierarchy, which will be reflected in the JSON output. The plugin captures instance information.

Avoid Unnecessary Grouping: Whenever possible, use Frames with Auto Layout instead of nested groups (Group > Group > Element). This results in a cleaner and more semantic JSON structure.


Limitations & Caveats:

Mixed Styles in Text: While the plugin recursively finds the properties of individual elements, if a single text node contains multiple styles (e.g., different fonts or colors applied to different words), the Figma API provides summary data. The plugin will note this but cannot separate the mixed styles within that single element.

Complex Vector Data: This plugin focuses on properties relevant for UI layout and styling. It does not export the raw path data (<path d="...">) of complex vector networks or boolean operations.

API Boundaries: The plugin can only extract data that is exposed by the official Figma Plugin API.


Support the Developer

This plugin is developed and maintained with love. If you find it useful and it saves you time, you can say thanks by supporting its future development. Every bit of support is hugely appreciated!

Monobank: https://send.monobank.ua/jar/6szYjffq5z

USDT (BEP20): 0x3E6137a18118D6Eb97B1b830C7CC7a862D4b1e76

BTC: bc1q9ye90fd5xe62srglv84hjktwdggtkzf4xttn7h
plugins.tagline: Compose your design into JSON describing all the elements - easy to translate into the webpage

The plugin will note this but cannot separate the mixed styles within that single element.

Complex Vector Data: This plugin focuses on properties relevant for UI layout and styling. It does not export the raw path data (<path d="...">) of complex vector networks or boolean operations.

API Boundaries: The plugin can only extract data that is exposed by the official Figma Plugin API.


Support the Developer

This plugin is developed and maintained with love. If you find it useful and it saves you time, you can say thanks by supporting its future development. Every bit of support is hugely appreciated!

Monobank: https://send.monobank.ua/jar/6szYjffq5z

USDT (BEP20): 0x3E6137a18118D6Eb97B1b830C7CC7a862D4b1e76

BTC: bc1q9ye90fd5xe62srglv84hjktwdggtkzf4xttn7h
137484.tagline: Compose your design into JSON describing all the elements - easy to translate into the webpage

plugins.name: Real Content Filler
plugins.description:
Real Data Filler is a quick and smart plugin that populates your Figma text layers with realistic placeholder data perfect for mockups, UI design, and prototypes.


Choose from a clean, tabbed interface with options like:


Names (full names, first/last)


Emails (realistic domains)


Cities (worldwide)


Phone Numbers


Custom Lists (coming soon)


Each selected text node gets a random data value of the type you select.


Use this to:


Populate wireframes with real-seeming names and emails


Fill mobile/table UI designs with user data


Quickly visualize form states and list views

plugins.name: Wave Flag Insert Plugin
plugins.description:
Insert beautifully crafted country flags directly into your Figma designs with one click.


FlagPack SVG makes it easy to browse, search, and insert high-quality SVG flags into your design projects. Simply search for a country name, click on the flag, and it appears right on your canvasready to scale, customize, or use as-is.


How to Use:


  1. Open the plugin in Figma.


  1. Use the search bar to find a specific flag.


  1. Click on any flag to insert it into your current page.


Done!


Ideal for UI mockups, dashboards, internationalization features, and travel apps.

plugins.name: Slide Auto-Numbering by Works.
plugins.description:
Slide Auto-Numbering


This plugin automatically numbers your Figma Slides. Wherever a TEXT layer named page number exists, it will be overwritten with the correct slide index (1, 2, 3, ).


How to use:

Ensure each slide has a TEXT layer named page number.

Run the plugin (Plugins Development Slide Auto-Numbering Run).

The plugin will number the slides linearly in the order provided by Figma Slides.
plugins.tagline: Auto-number your slides ;)

135716.name: Slide Auto-Numbering by Works.
135716.description:

How to use:

Ensure each slide has a TEXT layer named page number.

Run the plugin (Plugins Development Slide Auto-Numbering Run).

The plugin will number the slides linearly in the order provided by Figma Slides.
135716.release_notes: This plugin is for only for Figma Slides, the Figma Design option is removed to avoid confusion.

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). Its perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
plugins.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

135132.name: Timestamp
135132.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). Its perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
135132.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

plugins.name: Image Compressor FREE
plugins.description:
A small but mighty Figma plugin that helps you compress and replace images right inside your designs.

Simply select one or more image layers or let the plugin dive deep into nested frames and groups.

You can control the compression level, and the plugin will convert images to optimized JPEGs on the fly.

Perfect for preparing files for lightweight PDF exports or sharing compact mockups with clients and developers.

Minimal, clean, and respectful of your layout this tool does one job well and doesnt get in your way.
plugins.tagline: image compression, export, lightweight, jpeg, optimization, size, nested images, size, png, jpg

134694.name: Image Compressor FREE
134694.description:
A small but mighty Figma plugin that helps you compress and replace images right inside your designs.

Simply select one or more image layers or let the plugin dive deep into nested frames and groups.

You can control the compression level, and the plugin will convert images to optimized JPEGs on the fly.

Perfect for preparing files for lightweight PDF exports or sharing compact mockups with clients and developers.

Minimal, clean, and respectful of your layout this tool does one job well and doesnt get in your way.
134694.release_notes:
Version 1.0.0  Initial Release
Features:

 Compress and replace image fills with optimized JPEGs

 Adjustable compression quality (10100)

 Option to search nested images inside frames and groups

 Multilingual interface (9 languages supported)

 Clear visual report: before / after size & savings

 Result compression bar with color feedback
134694.tagline: image compression, export, lightweight, jpeg, optimization, size, nested images, size, png, jpg

plugins.name: Expression Blast
plugins.description:
As humans we feel. As humans we express.

We experience emotions like hunger, hangovers, confusion, or surprise. As designers especially, we often forget to eat, choosing instead to perfect one more button variation or tweak the kerning just a bit moreat the cost of sleep.

We feel so many things, yet have so few outlets to express themwhether we're collaborating with teammates or simply needing a small boost of joy. Thats why I created Expression Blast: a plugin that gives designers a playful way to express the real, everyday emotions we all experience.
plugins.tagline: An Outlet for Everyday Emotions.

134486.description:

plugins.name: adamantium token lab - analyze, organize & export tokens
plugins.description:
adamantium token lab

Your ultimate Figma Variables exporter & manager to rule your tokens.


Stop manually transcribing design tokens! adamantium token lab bridges the gap between your Figma Variables and your codebase, streamlining your design-to-development workflow with unparalleled power and flexibility.


Whether you're working with a simple project or a complex multi-library design system, adamantium token lab gives you the tools to view, manage, analyze, and export your design tokens exactly how you need them. Say goodbye to errors, inconsistencies, and wasted time.


Why You Need adamantium token lab:

  1. Bridge the Design-Dev Gap: Seamlessly translate your Figma Variables into production-ready code.
  2. Ensure Consistency: Maintain a single source of truth for your design tokens across all projects.
  3. Boost Efficiency: Automate token exports, saving hours and reducing manual errors.
  4. Unmatched Customization: Tailor token output to perfectly match your team's coding standards.
  5. Maintain a Clean Design System: Understand token usage, identify unused variables, and keep your system tidy.
  6. Empower Collaboration: Provide developers with exactly what they need, in their preferred format.
  7. Handle Complexity with Ease: Advanced features like comprehensive library alias resolution simplify managing large-scale design systems.



Core Features:

Token Viewing & Management:

  1. View all Figma Variables (colors, numbers, strings, booleans) in a dynamic, resizable table.
  2. See token names, descriptions, types, and values per mode at a glance.
  3. Toggle in-table alias resolution to see actual values directly.
  4. Customize the display format for color values (HEX, RGBA, HSLA, etc.) in the table.
  5. Easily filter and view tokens from specific collections.


Powerful & Highly Customizable Export Engine:

  1. Export to CSS Custom Properties.
  2. Export to SASS Variables ($var).
  3. Export to SASS Maps (Nested or Flat options available).
  4. Export to JSON (Structured or Nested, with options for flat key paths).
  5. Export a developer-friendly Intermediate Representation (IR) for custom workflows.
  6. Apply naming conventions: camelCase, PascalCase, kebab-case, snake_case, and more.
  7. Add custom prefixes and suffixes to token names or filenames.
  8. Define custom path separators for token names (e.g., -, _, .).
  9. Output colors in various formats: HEX, HEX8, RGB(A), HSL(A), HSB(A).
  10. Configure numeric units (px, rem, em, pt) and base font size for rem/em.
  11. Choose your alias strategy: embed resolved values or reference original variables/map keys.
  12. Optionally include collection and mode names in exported variable names.
  13. Include token descriptions as comments in your exported code.
  14. Output JSON color values as strings or structured objects.
  15. Customize CSS mode selector templates (e.g., :root[data-theme="$MODE"]).
  16. See an instant live preview of your export with syntax highlighting.
  17. Download generated token files easily.


Advanced Token Usage Analysis:

  1. Identify which design tokens are actively used in your Figma designs.
  2. Analyze token usage on the "Current Page" or across the "Entire File".
  3. View a "Used" column in the token table for clear visual indicators.
  4. See updated collection counts showing (used / total) tokens after analysis.
  5. View a prominent banner confirming the scope and results of the last analysis.
  6. Filter the token list to show "All," "Used," or "Unused" tokens.


Deep Library Integration (All Features Currently Enabled):

  1. Effortlessly work with variables from your enabled Figma libraries.
  2. See clear indicators for the source library of your collections, including the library name where available.
  3. Includes powerful, deep alias resolution across external libraries essential for complex design systems, ensuring your exported values are always accurate.
  4. The UI intuitively displays information about library-linked aliases with distinct styling, providing full clarity in your token management.


Get Started with adamantium token lab Today!

Take control of your design tokens, accelerate your development process, and ensure unparalleled consistency across your projects. Install adamantium token lab and transform your Figma Variables workflow!



This is a Beta Version!

adamantium token lab is currently in active development and is being released as a Beta version. This means that while we've worked hard to make it powerful and stable, you might encounter occasional bugs or quirks.


Your Feedback is Gold!

We are incredibly passionate about making adamantium token lab the best token management tool for you, and your experience and insights are crucial to this journey. As you use the plugin, please help us improve by:


  1. Reporting any bugs or issues you encounter.
  2. Sharing your feature requests and ideas for new functionality.
  3. Letting us know what you love and what could be even better.


Your feedback will directly shape the future of adamantium token lab, helping us to squash bugs, refine features, and build the ultimate token workflow tool. We're committed to regular updates and improvements based on your input.
plugins.tagline: analyze, organize, name, export, cleanup. One token lab to rule your tokens (figma variables).

plugins.name: Hints
plugins.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figmas latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figmas latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!

BorderBuddy helps you speed up your workflow by displaying the current border radius of elements inside a selected frame, allowing you to adjust all values at once with a single click. Perfect for cleaning up inconsistent UI or testing design variations.

plugins.name: AI Alt Text Generator
plugins.description:
# Figma Plugin: AI Alt Text Generator


AI Alt Text GeneratorFigmaGoogle GeminiOpenAIAIaltFigma


---


##

- **GeminiGoogleOpenAI Vision API**alt

- **UI/**

- **APIFigmaclientStorage**

- **15**

- ****

- ****

- ****


---


##

1. Figma

2. [Google Gemini API](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) [OpenAI API](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

3. API


---


##

1. **Figma**

2. Alt

3.

4.

5.

6.

7.


---


##

- | EnglishUI


---


## API

- GeminiOpenAIAPIGemini

- APIFigmaclientStorage

-


---


##

- AIGoogle Gemini/OpenAI

- altAI


---


## English


### Overview

AI Alt Text Generator is a Figma plugin that uses Google Gemini or OpenAI Vision APIs to automatically generate accessible alt text for selected images in your Figma file.


### Features

- Generate alt text using **Gemini (Google) or OpenAI Vision API**

- **UI and prompt language switch (Japanese/English)** with a single button

- **API keys are securely saved** using Figma's clientStorage

- **Generate multiple candidates (15) at once, editable and selectable**

- **Keyword input** to influence the generated alt text

- **Image preview** and status display

- **Clear error feedback**


### Setup

1. Install the plugin in Figma

2. Obtain a [Google Gemini API key](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) or an [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

3. Launch the plugin and enter/save your API key(s) in the Settings tab


### How to Use

1. **Select an image node on the Figma canvas**

2. In the "Generate Alt Text" tab, click the "Analyze Image" button

3. The image preview and size will be displayed

4. Optionally, enter keywords (comma-separated for English, "" for Japanese) and select the number of candidates

5. Click the "Generate Alt Text" button

6. Candidate alt texts will be displayed, each editable

7. Copy the desired alt text and paste it into Figma's alt text field or elsewhere as needed


### Language Switch

- Use the " | English" button at the top right to instantly switch all UI and prompts between Japanese and English


### About API Keys

- Either Gemini or OpenAI API key is required (if both are entered, Gemini is prioritized)

- API keys are securely saved in Figma's clientStorage

- Please check each service's official documentation for free tier and usage limits


### Notes

- This plugin sends the selected image to external AI services (Google Gemini/OpenAI) for analysis. Please be mindful of privacy and confidential information.

- The generated alt text is AI-generated; please review and edit as needed before use.
plugins.tagline: AI Alt Text GeneratorFigmaGoogle GeminiOpenAIAIalt

plugins.name: Figma 2 FRIDA
plugins.description: Users can select Figma frames to automatically generate clean, functional code for Flutter, React, Kotlin and Angular, with the code adapting to the specific data within the frames. This includes not only the UI components but also layout structures and other relevant data. Additionally, the tool provides the ability to generate automated test cases based on the generated code, helping ensure quality and functionality. For app deployment, users can generate the necessary icon files tailored for various platforms, simplifying the process for app deployment across different app stores and environments.
plugins.tagline: Generate code for both mobile and web based on Figma UI designs.

131649.name: Figma 2 FRIDA
131649.description: Users can select Figma frames to automatically generate clean, functional code for Flutter, React, Kotlin and Angular, with the code adapting to the specific data within the frames. This includes not only the UI components but also layout structures and other relevant data. Additionally, the tool provides the ability to generate automated test cases based on the generated code, helping ensure quality and functionality. For app deployment, users can generate the necessary icon files tailored for various platforms, simplifying the process for app deployment across different app stores and environments.

networkAccess.reasoning: To access Firebase services and external APIs

131649.tagline: Generate code for both mobile and web based on Figma UI designs.

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

131062.name: Quick Navigator
131062.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
131062.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: SliceView
plugins.description: Depths creates a stacked x-ray view of any layer in Figma. It separates and reveals each layer in depth order, making it easier to understand complex groupings, overlapping elements, and hierarchy at a glance.
plugins.tagline: Peek inside your layers. Visualize depth and stacking in your Figma selection.

129691.name: SliceView

129691.tagline: Peek inside your layers. Visualize depth and stacking in your Figma selection.

plugins.name: Kieran's Super Easy Design Flow

127119.name: Kieran's Super Easy Design Flow
127119.description: Simple automated Kanban board plugin to simplify the design process from draft through to approved status.

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: Preview Card Creator
plugins.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  1. Got summary or overview pages? This is useful for deeper linking into specific pages without having to be familiar with the file.
  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

125915.name: Preview Card Creator

125915.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

plugins.name: Smart Accessibility Checker
plugins.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and inclusive with the Smart Accessibility Checker! This Figma plugin scans for contrast issues, touch target sizes, font readability, and color-blindness concernshelping you create user-friendly designs effortlessly. Get instant AI suggested insights and basic fixes to improve accessibility in real-time!
plugins.tagline: Design with Clarity: Smarter, Accessible, Inclusive

128248.name: Smart Accessibility Checker
128248.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and inclusive with the Smart Accessibility Checker! This Figma plugin scans for contrast issues, touch target sizes, font readability, and color-blindness concernshelping you create user-friendly designs effortlessly. Get instant AI suggested insights and basic fixes to improve accessibility in real-time!
128248.release_notes:
Version 3.0  Now with Auto-Fix!
Were back with a powerful update! 

 Whats New in v3.0
 Auto-Fix for Font Size
Text nodes that fall below accessibility standards are automatically updated to a minimum readable size of 12px.

 Auto-Fix for Touch Targets
Interactive elements smaller than 48x48 px are now automatically resized to meet accessibility guidelines for tap targets.

These improvements help you stay WCAG-compliant with just one click. Perfect for speeding up your design workflow while ensuring usability for all.
128248.tagline: Design with Clarity: Smarter, Accessible, Inclusive

plugins.name: Simple Text Replacer
plugins.description:
This is a language management tool plugin for those preparing for global services. You can easily switch to multiple languages and replace text. It is currently in development and we would like to deploy it as a test. We'll upgrade as we go.

Please Check the Sample Video https://youtu.be/yY647Y6jinU

  1. The contents may still be changing. When they do, we'll make it as easy as possible for you to use them.

plugins.name: ei-design-code
plugins.description: Designed for front-end developers and designers, this tool instantly converts Figma designs into high-quality code. It supports parsing Ant Design components and kuma-ui styles, leveraging AI to generate well-structured, reusable code for a more efficient and seamless development experience.
plugins.tagline: design-to-code
